I don't know either, but I was thinking that maybe you have come
across som=
e URLs that are trigging an error (such as a timeout).

The default for Her=
itrix is to wait 15 minutes, and then try again (up
to 30 times).

If you h=
ave URLs like that in your queue, then they will be around for
a long time.=


Reduce the delay to try again, and reduce the number of times to retry.

=
Hope that helps.

P.S. What do the logs show for those URLs?

bs are slowing down drastically at the end of the crawl
despite

hreads being active according to web UI.  I would
understand if the

e thread count was reduced significantly, but it isn't.  The
CPU usage

st takes a downward spiral.  Is there a sheets option that monitors or
